name: TWiki.net
overview:
TWiki.net creates and supports enterprise solutions using the TWiki platform, and provides customer support services for TWiki as well.

TWikis creator and founder, Peter Thoeny, guides the companys technology strategy. He has spearheaded TWikis development for over a decade.

Jitendra Kavathekar, President and CEO, brings business strategy, analytics, and marketing know-how to the company, from previous positions at Yahoo!, Motorola, Palm, and HP among others.

Tom Barton, Chairman of the Board, brings C-level experience from Rackable and RedHat.

Saeed Amidi, Founder and CEO of Plug and Play Tech Center, a technology startup accelerator that hosts over 230 International startups, is also on the Board of Directors.

TWiki also has a board of advisors - more details here: http://www.twiki.net/about.html
